ud8.7:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kosalesu addhānamaggappaṭipanno hoti āyasmatā nāgasamālena pacchāsamaṇena.
ud8.7:1.3: Addasā kho āyasmā nāgasamālo antarāmagge dvidhāpathaṃ.
ud8.7:1.7: Evaṃ vutte, bhagavā āyasmantaṃ nāgasamālaṃ etadavoca:
ud8.7:2.2: tatiyampi kho āyasmā nāgasamālo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
ud8.7:2.5: Tatiyampi kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ nāgasamālaṃ etadavoca:
ud8.7:2.8: Atha kho āyasmā nāgasamālo bhagavato pattacīvaraṃ tattheva chamāyaṃ nikkhipitvā pakkāmi:
ud8.7:3.1: Atha kho āyasmato nāgasamālassa tena panthena gacchantassa antarāmagge corā nikkhamitvā hatthehi ca pādehi ca ākoṭesuṃ pattañca bhindiṃsu saṅghāṭiñca vipphālesuṃ.
ud8.7:3.2: Atha kho āyasmā nāgasamālo bhinnena pattena vipphālitāya saṅghāṭiyā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
ud8.7:3.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā nāgasamālo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
ud8.7:3.4: “idha mayhaṃ, bhante, tena panthena gacchantassa antarāmagge corā nikkhamitvā hatthehi ca pādehi ca ākoṭesuṃ, pattañca bhindiṃsu, saṅghāṭiñca vipphālesun”ti.
ud8.7:4.1: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi:
